EmailTemplate.name: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation for Webinar: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration Confirmation Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the webinar on Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview.
You will receive a reminder one day before the live event, as well as a reminder within one hour before the start of the webinar.
We look forward to having you attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/tztxryv
DATE: October 21, 2011
TIME: 2 PM Eastern | 1 PM Central | Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific
PRESENTER: Dan Voss, Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
